update.description:
1. Suppress warnings in external headers:

    * deps/opende/OPCODE/Opcode.h
    * gazebo/gui/qtpropertybrowser/qtpropertybrowserutils.cpp
    * gazebo/gui/qtpropertybrowser/qttreepropertybrowser.cpp
    * gazebo/rendering/skyx/include/Prerequisites.h

1. Similar to 1, create ffmpeg_inc.h with `#pragma clang system_header` to prevent ffmpeg warnings

    * gazebo/common/AudioDecoder.cc
    * gazebo/common/AudioDecoder_TEST.cc
    * gazebo/common/CommonIface.cc
    * gazebo/common/Video.cc

1. Unused variables

    * gazebo/Server.hh
    * gazebo/gui/*Maker.cc
    * gazebo/rendering/OrbitViewController.hh
    * plugins/DiffDrivePlugin.hh

1. Suppress warnings about overloaded virtual. The warning occurs because we're using our own SM2Profile class instead of `OGRE::SM2Profile`.

    * gazebo/rendering/Heightmap.hh

1. Rename function to avoid overloaded virtual warning.

    * test/integration/pr2.cc

1. Unused function arguments when CEGUI is not installed.

    * gazebo/rendering/GUIOverlay.hh

1. Fixed casting from double to int in Time_TEST, assuming that we wanted to test the Time constructor that takes a double as input (just one argument).

    * gazebo/common/Time_TEST.cc

1. Wrap `#define SIZE_MAX` in `#ifndef`

    * deps/opende/src/util.h
update.title: Fix more clang warnings

content.raw: fixed the last one in c1d1aec

update.title: Fix more clang warnings

content.html:
Probably I miss the header ...

#include <assert.h>

content.raw:
That gives me a warning and then a linking error:
~~~
/Users/scpeters/osrf/gazebo/deps/opende/src/fastldlt.c:381:7: warning: implicit declaration of function 'assert' is invalid
      in C99 [-Wimplicit-function-declaration]
      assert(1);
      ^
~~~
~~~
Undefined symbols for architecture x86_64:
  "_assert", referenced from:
      __dFactorLDLT in fastldlt.c.o
ld: symbol(s) not found for architecture x86_64
clang: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
make[3]: *** [deps/opende/libgazebo_ode.3.0.0.dylib] Error 1
make[2]: *** [deps/opende/CMakeFiles/gazebo_ode.dir/all] Error 2
make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
~~~
content.html:
That gives me a warning and then a linking error:

/Users/scpeters/osrf/gazebo/deps/opende/src/fastldlt.c:381:7: warning: implicit declaration of function 'assert' is invalid
      in C99 [-Wimplicit-function-declaration]
      assert(1);
      ^

Undefined symbols for architecture x86_64:
  "_assert", referenced from:
      __dFactorLDLT in fastldlt.c.o
ld: symbol(s) not found for architecture x86_64
clang: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
make[3]: *** [deps/opende/libgazebo_ode.3.0.0.dylib] Error 1
make[2]: *** [deps/opende/CMakeFiles/gazebo_ode.dir/all] Error 2
make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....

One of them is just forcing a segfault ... a bit hardcore for me. Should be fixed by:

--- a/deps/opende/src/fastldlt.c    Wed Mar 12 07:42:07 2014 +0000
+++ b/deps/opende/src/fastldlt.c    Wed Mar 12 18:51:46 2014 +0100
@@ -376,7 +376,8 @@
     /* done factorizing 1 x 1 block */
     break;

-    default: *((char*)0)=0;  /* this should never happen! */
+    default: 
+       assert(1);
   }
 }

update.description:
1. Suppress warnings in external headers:

    * deps/opende/OPCODE/Opcode.h
    * gazebo/gui/qtpropertybrowser/qtpropertybrowserutils.cpp
    * gazebo/gui/qtpropertybrowser/qttreepropertybrowser.cpp
    * gazebo/rendering/skyx/include/Prerequisites.h

1. Similar to 1, create ffmpeg_inc.h with `#pragma clang system_header` to prevent ffmpeg warnings

    * gazebo/common/AudioDecoder.cc
    * gazebo/common/AudioDecoder_TEST.cc
    * gazebo/common/CommonIface.cc
    * gazebo/common/Video.cc

1. Unused variables

    * gazebo/Server.hh
    * gazebo/gui/*Maker.cc
    * gazebo/rendering/OrbitViewController.hh
    * plugins/DiffDrivePlugin.hh

1. Suppress warnings about overloaded virtual. The warning occurs because we're using our own SM2Profile class instead of `OGRE::SM2Profile`.

    * gazebo/rendering/Heightmap.hh

1. Rename function to avoid overloaded virtual warning.

    * test/integration/pr2.cc

1. Unused function arguments when CEGUI is not installed.

    * gazebo/rendering/GUIOverlay.hh

1. Fixed casting from double to int in Time_TEST, assuming that we wanted to test the Time constructor that takes a double as input (just one argument).

    * gazebo/common/Time_TEST.cc

1. Wrap `#define SIZE_MAX` in `#ifndef`

    * deps/opende/src/util.h
update.title: Fix more clang warnings

content.raw:
there is another one about unused private field in `Video.hh` which is easy to fix. This is produced if there's no `HAVE_FFMPEG` 

just need set `this->videoStream = -1` in  `Video.cc` 's constructor
content.html:
there is another one about unused private field in Video.hh which is easy to fix. This is produced if there's no HAVE_FFMPEG

just need set this->videoStream = -1 in Video.cc 's constructor

content.raw: Should be fixed by e4ac20552218 and 8665d434c23c
content.html: Should be fixed by e4ac20552218 and 8665d434c23c

content.raw:
Files with this line:

`#pragma clang system_header`

Cause these build warnings:

`gazebo_default/deps/opende/OPCODE/Opcode.h:22:0: warning: ignoring #pragma clang system_header [-Wunknown-pragmas]
 #pragma clang system_header`


Another pragma warning:
`gazebo/gui/qtpropertybrowser/qttreepropertybrowser.cpp:42:0: warning: ignoring #pragma clang diagnostic [-Wunknown-pragmas]
 #pragma clang diagnostic ignored "-Wunused-private-field"`
content.html:
Files with this line:

#pragma clang system_header

Cause these build warnings:

gazebo_default/deps/opende/OPCODE/Opcode.h:22:0: warning: ignoring #pragma clang system_header [-Wunknown-pragmas] #pragma clang system_header

Another pragma warning: gazebo/gui/qtpropertybrowser/qttreepropertybrowser.cpp:42:0: warning: ignoring #pragma clang diagnostic [-Wunknown-pragmas] #pragma clang diagnostic ignored "-Wunused-private-field"
